metadata.title: CVE-2015-2806 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in asn1_der_decoding in libtasn1 before 4.4allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-3-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.2
libtasn1-6 - 3.4-3ubuntu0.2
libtasn1-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4-3ubuntu0.2').
